directions.step:
1. Select sweet potatoes for uniform shape and size. Scrub potatoes well and pierce each potato with tines of fork. 2. Arrange on paper toweling, leaving at least 1 inch between potatoes. 3. Bake according to cooking chart below. 4. Check for doneness as cooking times vary according to variety and shape of potatoes. 1 potato 4 minutes 2 potatoes 7 minutes 4 potatoes 15 minutes 6 potatoes 25 minutes Tip: Potatoes should be arranged in a circle with as much space as possible between them. Never place one potato in the center of the circle, as it may not cook.
